item.title: Tijuana Flats

The post Tijuana Flats appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
Tijuana Flats is an Orlando staple. While it’s now a chain spreading quickly across the southeastern United States, it all started here in town when two UCF students had a dream. You can practically find a Tijuana in just about every neighborhood here in town, and frankly, that’s a good thing.

Pictured above are blackened chicken Dos Tacos. The tacos are great in their own right, but Tijuana provides a great option for deal seekers as well. On Tuesdays, this meal (including a drink), is only $4.99. Practically a steal. The tacos are good, especially if you go for the grilled option. If you’re not into tacos, just about everything on the menu is fantastic.

Be sure to check out Tijuana’s Taco Tuesday $4.99 promotion.

The post Tijuana Flats appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
